author: Xbox
description:
Welcome to The Alters – Expedition Logs, a series documenting the journey behind the game—its design, mechanics, and the challenges that make it a truly personal and one-of-a-kind survival experience. Each entry will take us deeper into the heart of The Alters—from its unique approach to survival to the mysteries of the planet, and the emotional struggle of working alongside alternate versions of yourself.

Our first log explores the foundation of The Alters—how it starts as a survival game yet quickly transforms into something much more. As the series unfolds, we’ll delve into the real challenge: managing your own alternate selves. Can you lead versions of yourself who may resent you—or believe they should be in charge instead? We’ll tackle the pressure of time, limited resources, and tough decisions that leave no one truly satisfied, as well as the final additions made to the game in the last stretch of development.

Next episode coming soon.

Strap in. The expedition is just begin
title: The Alters Expedition Logs Episode 1 - Not Your Typical Survival Game

author: Xbox
description:
Painkiller is a modern reimagining of the classic franchise, featuring online co-op for up to three players and offline play. Battle hordes of demons and titanic terrors across richly detailed gothic environments.

Trapped in Purgatory, you are sentenced for your transgressions against Heaven. But the Voice of the Creator gives you a chance to redeem yourself.  

Coming to Xbox this Fall, Wishlist Now!

author: Xbox
description:
The Oldest House has been taken over by an unlikely threat: Sticky Notes. Their endless replication needs to be stopped immediately but they won’t go down without a fight and the Hiss will be there to hinder you every step of the way.  

FBC: Firebreak is a 3-player cooperative first-person shooter set within the enigmatic Federal Bureau of Control (FBC). As the Bureau’s headquarters faces a deadly and prolonged siege by otherworldly forces, only Firebreak—its most adaptable response unit—has the skills and courage to restore order.  

FBC: Firebreak is scheduled to release in Summer 2025 for PC and Xbox Series X|S. Wishlist now! 

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/fbc-firebreak/9pdcn8z4hkrn

author: Xbox
description:
Out now
https://www.xbox.com/games/assassins-creed-shadows

One warrior stands upon the battlefield… while another lives in the darkness…

Voiceover by Peter Shinkoda

About Assassin's Creed Shadows:
In Assassin’s Creed Shadows, you will live the intertwined stories of Naoe, an adept shinobi Assassin from Iga Province, and Yasuke, the powerful African samurai of historical legend. Against the backdrop of the turbulent late Sengoku period, this remarkable duo will discover their common destiny as they usher in a new era for Japan. 

From chaos to purpose, from darkness to light. A new Creed rises over Japan.

description:
Become iconic across three weeks of modes! In Power Sword Royale, secure a Power Sword with its own specific abilities. Then have fun with Mozambiques for April Fools, play Solos in the final week, and conquer creator community challenges to earn rewards. Plus, check out meta updates with new Skirmisher perks and Alter ability updates.

title: Apex Legends: Beast Mode Event Trailer

author: Xbox
description:
Atomfall will launch on March 27th 2025, coming to Xbox Game Pass, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and Windows PC.

Atomfall Deluxe Edition includes up to 3 days early access to play from March 24th 2025.

Pre-order now: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/atomfall/9NC4WDL5KZBL 

A single-player survival-action game inspired by real-life events, Atomfall is set five years after the Windscale nuclear disaster in Northern England.

Explore the fictional quarantine zone, scavenge, craft, barter, fight and talk your way through a British countryside setting filled with bizarre characters, mysticism, cults, and rogue government agencies.

From Rebellion, the studio behind Sniper Elite and Zombie Army, Atomfall will challenge you to solve the dark mystery of what really happened.

• Player Driven Mystery 
Unravel a tapestry of interwoven narratives through exploration, conversation, investigation, and combat, where every choice you make has consequences.

• Explore this Green and Unpleasant Land
title: Atomfall Pre-Launch Trailer

author: Xbox
description:
Deliver At All Costs is a thrilling action game where destruction, absurdity and intrigue collide!

The year is 1959. A time of rock 'n' roll, polka dot dresses and the ever-looming dread of nuclear annihilation. Step into the shoes of Winston Green — a down-on-his-luck courier with a fiery temper and a mysterious past — as he delivers highly unconventional cargo, leaving a trail of havoc and chaos behind him, ensuring he does what it takes to Deliver At All Costs!

Pre-order now on Xbox:  https://www.xbox.com/games/store/deliver-at-all-costs/9pmwkz7ftnp0
